Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Furthermore , BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 also exhibited the same trend in which their highest PCE was achieved by spin - coating the active blend layer at 80 °C .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12 |
| BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-14 |
| BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-16 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12 |
| BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-14 |
| BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-16 |

These entities are clearly referring to materials, specifically types of BHJ PSCs, and are distinguished by their different PffBB variants (PffBB-12, PffBB-14, and PffBB-16).

Paragraph: Furthermore , BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 also exhibited the same trend in which their highest PCE was achieved by spin - coating the active blend layer at 80 °C .

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Highest PCE of BHJ PSCs |
| Active blend layer temperature for BHJ PSCs |
| Temperature at which active blend layer is spin-coated for BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12, PffBB-14, and PffBB-16 |
| 80 °C |

Note: "BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12, PffBB-14, and PffBB-16" can be considered as a single material property, referring to the specific type of BHJ PSCs under consideration.

Paragraph: Furthermore , BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 also exhibited the same trend in which their highest PCE was achieved by spin - coating the active blend layer at 80 °C .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value               |
|-----------------------------|
| BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12    |
| BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-14    |
| BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-16    |
| Highest PCE                  |
| Spin-coating                 |
| Active blend layer           |
| Temperature: 80 °C           |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value               |
|-----------------------------|
| BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12, PffBB-14, PffBB-16 |
| Highest PCE                  |
| Temperature: 80 °C           |

Explanation:

* BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12, PffBB-14, PffBB-16 are not properties but rather types of BHJ PSCs. Therefore, they are not valid entities for this table.
* Spin-coating is a process and not a property. Therefore, it is not a valid entity for this table.
